snippet.title: Royal Booty Quest - Trailer #1
snippet.description:
Fused card games and roguelikes together to make the best single player deckbuilder.

This game doesn't require internet to play. Doesn't have the energy to limit your time. Doesn't have Ads. It doesn't download any more data. It doesn't collect any data.
It is free for real.
If you encounter a bug or have a suggestion- report it via feedback, Discord or Email.

Craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, discover relics of immense power! Slay monsters, conquer the Spire!
Or Descent into Deep Quest, while Wandering Night is not here yet.

Discord - last notes and updates: https://discord.gg/Jcg5Kt
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.elitegamesltd.royalquest&hl=en
iOs: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/royal-booty-quest/id1414474189
Itch: https://badim.itch.io/royalbootyquest

Inspired by "Deep Quest" and "Slay the Spire" and "Royal Heroes".
